short_summary: The Department of National Defence CFB Borden, Borden Ontario have a requirement one (1) new Push Pole Tent measuring 40 ft by 80 feet.
description: The Department of National Defence CFB Borden, Borden Ontario have a requirement one (1) new Push Pole Tent measuring 40 ft by 20 feet to be delivered and installed at Borden, Ontario. Assembly and disassembly and maintenance services for the tent are to be provided for up to three years.
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Document Title
Government Acquisition Tender W0113-24CS04 Tente for Department of National Defence

#### Reference Number
WS4320748030-Doc4320846998

#### Solicitation Number
WS4320748030

#### Tender Publication Date
* 23 November 2023

#### Tender Closing Date and Time
* 11 January 2024 at 14:00:00

#### Procurement Category
Goods and Services

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding 

#### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions
* Ontario (except NCR)

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### End User Entity
Department of National Defence (DND)
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Solicitation Information
The Department of National Defence, CFB Borden, Borden Ontario invites tenders for the supply of one (1) new Push Pole Tent measuring 40 ft by 80 feet. The tent is to be delivered and installed at Borden, Ontario. The contract also requires assembly and disassembly services, as well maintenance services, for up to three (3) years.

### Solicitation Details
The UN/SPSC Code is *49121503 and *95131700. The HF Code is *None*. The project is a Request for Proposal (RFP).

### Selection Criteria
The lowest price will be used to determine the successful bidder.

#### Contact Information
Semple, Patrick (SPAC/PSPC)
828-442-939-door
patrick.semple@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
